text: @realDonaldTrump Can you Believe you're still talking about a dam statue?? Shut up already.  Or come up with something relevant like cops killing Americans, Putin killing Americans, Covid19 killing Americans.   Pick any one. Statues surely should be below unemployment and the shitty economy?
